item.description:
Jill, One of our members will have a party at her house.

Talk about the new places and old places to go for the spring paddling season along with meeting people who do more than just kayaking..

Bring some good tasting Booze and some food for you and some to share..

DETAILS WILL BE UPDATED CLOSER TO THE EVENT DAY if necessary.

Preliminary details:

Xmas party at Jill's. 7:00 pm on December 14, Fryday

Bring your favorite Booze and Horsedevorse....(that stuff you eat with you fingers).. or some other good stuff..

if you know what you'll be bringing please mention
it in your comments.

Had too much to drink?
Spend the night.
Have your sleeping stuff in the car..
if you are roudy, you sleep out there...LOL

We'll be doing a 'Chinese' or
'swap' grab bag...10-15 dollar limit.

Bring something useful, bring something outrageious..its supposed to be fun when ya open it... Hmmmm...

Bring friends...the more the merrier. :)

AL-r needs a wild girlfriend..

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT
group.name: ~~~~HARTFORD COUNTY RIVERS & CT SHORE KAYAK GROUP~~~~ HCR-SK

item.name: Kayakers Group Party at Jill's Dec 14 in Watertown CT
